--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Fra=
nk Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> I'm thinking there is faces em=
bedded in sound, it's related to speech, and
> not just EVP. It seems to be=
 a normal function of our own minds(living or
> dead), the same as reverse =
speech. I found some faces in old EVPs from boxes
> and also in music files=
. The ones from Evanescence are pretty impressive in
> person, and do not s=
eem to be intentionaly embedded.
> 
> I know, it's not ghost hunters, and m=
ost don't want to have to think.
> I think most want this stuff in a neat l=
ittle box, all well defined, all
> rules and protocols known, but it just w=
on't stay in one box, or universe
> for that matter.
> 
> Frank-S
>
Dear Fr=
ank,

I think that I see what you mean. I mean no offense, but I it would b=
e helpful to see something a little more definitive that couldn't be mistak=
en for matrixing. Is this possible? Is it just me?

- Adrienne
